responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: what do you mean by building number
responses: BN or Building Number is the House Number you add to the Building Outline.

patterns: What to do if same BN, House Number, Building Number is present on two buildings, 2 buildings but with different postcodes?
responses: We can add house numbers to the 2 buildings/entities if 2 different postcodes are present according to SOP.

patterns: How to add BN, Building Number, House Number in case of 1,2,3,4,5?
responses: Add BN like 1-5 in the House number section.

patterns: How to add BN, Building Number, House Number in case of 200A,300B,400C,500D?
responses: You cannot add BN in this case since characters exceeding more than 10 characters.
